name: Colour Escape
description:
In a monochrome world,  a paint factory has exploded and you have to escape the incoming wave of colour.

Use [A] and [D] or the Arrow keys to move side to side. Press [Space] to jump and [S] to slam back down and bounce up for extra height.

Created for the Mini Jam 62 by MossyBackedSnail, GlitterDemon, and some help from Alfa3speed
